channel.title: Where are stored the data for objects, npc etc?
channel.description:
Hello,
I've tried the HybridScape/Morpascape server, I've started it locally, and could connect to it. I've looked in the archive, there are only a few megabytes, and I can't believe all the objects, place, npc and data for the 3D objects game are stored into this. Are they downloaded from internet ? Where ? Could you enlighten me about this ? It is possible to create new objects and add them to the regular world ?
Thank you in advance.

item.title: Where are stored the data for objects, npc etc?
item.dc:creator: @farv farv
item.description:
@farv wrote:

Hello,

I’ve tried the HybridScape/Morpascape server, I’ve started it locally, and could connect to it. I’ve looked in the archive, there are only a few megabytes, and I can’t believe all the objects, place, npc and data for the 3D objects game are stored into this. Are they downloaded from internet ? Where ?
Could you enlighten me about this ? It is possible to create new objects and add them to the regular world ?

Thank you in advance.
